validation.importError: Failed to import file. Please ensure it's a valid self-assessment JSON file.

teamView.emptyDescription: Add your first team member to start tracking competencies

individualView.emptyDescription: Add team members to view individual profiles

deleteDialog.title: Delete team member?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the team member and their data.

1.name: Adopts
1.description: Actively learns and adopts the technology and tools defined by the team

2.name: Specializes
2.description: Is the go-to person for one or more technologies and takes initiative to learn new ones

3.name: Evangelizes
3.description: Researches, creates proofs of concept and introduces new technologies to the team

4.name: Masters
4.description: Has very deep knowledge about the whole technology stack of the system

5.name: Creates
5.description: Designs and creates new technologies that are widely used either by internal or external teams

1.name: Enhances
1.description: Successfully pushes new features and bug fixes to improve and extend the system

2.name: Designs
2.description: Designs and implements medium to large size features while reducing the system's tech debt

3.name: Owns
3.description: Owns the production operation and monitoring of the system and is aware of its SLAs

4.name: Evolves
4.description: Evolves the architecture to support future requirements and defines its SLAs

5.name: Leads
5.description: Leads the technical excellence of the system and creates plans to mitigate outages

1.name: Learns
1.description: Quickly learns from others and consistently steps up when it is required

2.name: Supports
2.description: Proactively supports other team members and helps them to be successful

3.name: Mentors
3.description: Mentors others to accelerate their career-growth and encourages them to participate

4.name: Coordinates
4.description: Coordinates team members providing effective feedback and moderating discussions

5.name: Manages
5.description: Manages the team members' career, expectations, performance and level of happiness

1.name: Follows
1.description: Follows the team processes, delivering a consistent flow of features to production

2.name: Enforces
2.description: Enforces the team processes, making sure everybody understands the benefits and tradeoffs

3.name: Challenges
3.description: Challenges the team processes, looking for ways to improve them

4.name: Adjusts
4.description: Adjusts the team processes, listening to feedback and guiding the team through the changes

5.name: Defines
5.description: Defines the right processes for the team's maturity level, balancing agility and discipline

1.name: Subsystem
1.description: Makes an impact on one or more subsystems

2.name: Team
2.description: Makes an impact on the whole team, not just on specific parts of it

3.name: Multiple Teams
3.description: Makes an impact not only on their team but also on other teams

4.name: Company
4.description: Makes an impact on the whole tech organization

5.name: Community
5.description: Makes an impact on the tech community
